main event: The observer sighted a light to the east. When first seen it was blue-green and fairly close to the horizon in the southeast. When last seen it was at about 75 degrees elevation in the east-southeast and appeared the same as a star.
interesting points: The object appeared to be a tethered lighted balloon of large diameter, estimated to be 6 miles away.
The object was reported to the police, who checked with local balloon launchings but found no matches.
The object was then reported to Highlands AFB, who flew over the area but did not sight the object.
The object changed in size and brightness as it increased in elevation.
The observer noted the object appeared to stand still at one point and then begin an oscillating movement.
sighted object: a blue-green light that appeared to be a tethered lighted balloon
